snippet: Officials are grappling with what to do in the wake of the federal sequestration that led to broad cuts in military and domestic spending.
abstract: Organizers are looking for ways to salvage Fleet Week celebration in New York City, after Defense Dept puts hold on optional events in connection with federal sequestration that led to broad cuts in spending on military and domestic programs; 29-year-old event will likely go on as planned, but will be scaled back significantly.
lead_paragraph: Officials are grappling with what to do in the wake of the federal sequestration that led to broad cuts in military and domestic spending.

headline.seo: Fleet Week Is Threatened by Federal Budget Cuts
headline.main: With Federal Budget Cuts, Something Will Be Missing From Fleet Week: The Sailors
headline.print_headline: With Federal Budget Cuts, Something Will Be Missing From Fleet Week: The Sailors

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
